html:
10.2.24  7:45 pm   who does your music?

      me

10.2.24  6:49 pm   Are you going to be making any videos anytime soon?

      i'm making some now, but i'm also gonna be making more after that, and songs also

10.2.24  6:04 pm   how to know if you are a bad person

      i think that's impossible

10.2.24  5:03 pm   could you please paste whatever you have on your clipboard right now. thanks in advance

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.2.24  4:26 pm   hey bill, i only have common cold but i feel like shit, can you send some encouragement? 

      you should make a list of all the things you'd like to do when you get better. maybe if you weren't sick you wouldn't have even had time to make that list

10.2.24  4:24 pm   What drives you to post your work on the internet?

      it's easier than emailing it to everyone individually

10.2.24  4:01 pm   Does making music make your life better?

      yes

10.2.24  2:47 pm   do you ever get yourself down by accidentally comparing yourself to others

      yes

10.2.24  2:17 pm   depression and my period is killing me and all I'm looking forward to is my boyfriend taking me fishing on the weekend. what can I do to be less depressed and also get the weekend here faster?

but it won't be a Saturday on the weekend, I think. it's gonna be Sunday.

      if i were you i would write a short story

10.2.24  1:57 pm   Have you ever drawn E.T. before?

      no

10.2.24  12:39 pm   do you think music can be sexy? like not just sexy sounding but like the song itself is attractive. almost like if you were to personify a song theyd be objectively beautiful (or subjectively honestly. music and beauty are free to be interpreted)

      i don't see why not

10.2.24  12:12 pm   why is school so hard?

      to make you stronger

10.2.24  12:02 pm   i missed the opportunity to meet you last month, do you think I could next september or is it too late

      you could probably meet me any time. there's no reason why september would be more likely. Oh i get it, you were taking one of my songs literally as factual information..... wow i just realized how much other stuff you must also think are true, if that's the case

10.2.24  11:46 am   *URGENT REMINDER - DON'T SKIP THIS MESSAGE*

hi!

      hi

10.2.24  11:40 am   Can you play the saxophone 

      no

10.2.24  11:33 am   What is your grand purpose, Bill?

      to try different things and see what effect they have

10.2.24  10:42 am   Would you be so kind as to provide some philosophy?

      sure

10.2.24  9:37 am   do you often look at trees?

      sometimes

10.2.24  8:55 am   why do I exist Bill please tell me 

      why wouldn't you

10.2.24  8:27 am   how was your trip to the land of the two-letter words?

      it was fine, i ended up coming up with a string of 2 letter words that fit the melody and had the desired effect, in the next line of the song

10.2.24  8:21 am   bill, i am failing in life. not in society's view of life, as in work, studies, stuff like that, but more of life itself and how i experience it. i am failing in it. it is awful. what should i do. 

      start by just going somewhere new

10.2.24  8:07 am   How do you get inspiration to make your songs?

      already had the inspiration. the question is how do i make the songs

10.2.24  7:07 am   Have you been getting much rest lately? 

      yes

10.2.24  4:47 am   wazzap bill id say I'm an amateur at piano even though I have about 3 years of experience and i wanna start writing my own songs. how would I go about doing that do I just use random chords and melodies until it sounds good or is there a general guideline on making music?

      it's the same way you speak, with words. Do you just try random words until it works? no. it's almost like some kind of intuitive lightning bolt that magically reveals the words to you. probably neither of us really knows how that works. but it's your imagination, and it works the same way with music. the more experience you have with the words (notes) and what they sound like (and mean), the better you'll be able to do it

10.2.24  4:21 am   i feel like i need badly to choose a thing to focus on but i genuinely love so many things and life has made it thus far difficult for me to have landed on one thing that "works" but it was never a lack of passionate supply. but now i'm Grown and it's getting to be a problem that i don't have a Life's Purpose. or so it seems.  that's the very short version anyway. should i just spin a wheel and lock myself in a dungeon with one thing to focus on at this point. or what. ):

      you could try that. there's like 100 ways to go about this situation, and none of the ways are actually right or wrong. it's almost like you're supposed to try them all

10.2.24  2:57 am   Can you let me out of your basement? please and thank you

      sorry there is some mistake. i don't have a basement

10.2.24  2:11 am   Face reveal when?

      as soon as you start paying attention

10.2.24  1:51 am   is there a madness to your method?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.2.24  12:54 am   i think nothing is real (in a good way)

      ok but then what would the word 'real' mean

10.1.24  11:51 pm   A bit overplayed in some places maybe but, thoughts on All the Things You Are?

      i actually don't remember how that one goes

10.1.24  11:46 pm   every time i come on here i have to fight the most insane urge to type massive blocks of text about shit literally no one but me cares about 

      there is a tendency for me to care about whatever is genuinely sent to me

10.1.24  11:16 pm   Opinion on bowties?

      i'll believe it when i see it

10.1.24  11:06 pm   What is what

      itself

10.1.24  10:37 pm   how do u avoid the hellhole of modern web development 

      never even occured to me go near it

10.1.24  10:01 pm   what do you do when you're not making music? 

      make videos to go with the music, or, make videos for music to go with

10.1.24  9:04 pm   should i do stuff or things

      maybe you could weave them together into an intricate mosaic

10.1.24  8:10 pm   does the term "important person" imply the existence of unimportant people?

      yes, within the context of the subject at hand

10.1.24  7:02 pm   opinion on pharmacology??

      so crazy, it just might work

10.1.24  5:59 pm   What is your opinion on potatoes?

      they seem like a work of fiction

10.1.24  4:20 pm   people ask you all the time why you don't capitalise letters but i observed that that's not true, you choose to capitalise letters randomly in between sentences sometimes 

      my use of capitalization is not random, i use it as a communication tool, in various useful ways. the one way i usually DON'T use it is for strictly formal purposes

10.1.24  4:14 pm   is your music philosophical or prophetic or both or neither

      it can be, but it doesn't have to be

10.1.24  4:11 pm   well, its october 1st- ze spooky month has begun - are u going to participate?

      i'll participate in the month, but not so much the holiday themes

10.1.24  2:37 pm   What should my senior quote be

      how about something you actually said. such as "What should my senior quote be"

10.1.24  2:29 pm   will you make a new movie to be your favorite?

      i'll try

10.1.24  1:42 pm   How much about transcribing comping by ear relies on recognizing the shapes that would make the most sense in context? Where did you get that base knowledge?

      in this case the word 'comping' has so many different meanings that i actually can't even figure out what subject you're talking about

10.1.24  1:13 pm   Where would you rate october in relation to the other months

      tied for longest

10.1.24  11:48 am   whats your favorite baseball team?

      i don't know any baseball teams

10.1.24  10:56 am   what do you think of math majors

      kind of jealous

10.1.24  10:45 am   if want to simulate a piano to the highest degree, what keyboard should i get

      a steinway grand piano

10.1.24  10:14 am   thinking about changing my alarm again soon, which of your pieces of music would you recommend? i've used "i can play", "late nite lounge with loud lenny", and "window pain"

      the whole reason i've made multiple pieces of work is to get around having to choose 1. apparently i'm still struggling with that to this day
